description: The Tenth Diary user. A rich man with elegant taste, Karyuudo is a dog breeder who loves and cares about his dogs so much that he neglect his family. His diary is the Breeder`s Diary (飼育日記 Shiiku Nikki), which allows him to control his dogs to attack his enemies using his cell phone by voice command. However, it`s the disadvantage is that the more dogs that user control, the greater concentration needed to command all of them which leaves the user vulnerable. Karyuudo gets shot to death by http://anidb.net/ch36462 [Keigo].He is named after the Roman goddess Diana.
name: Tsukishima Karyuudo
